text: Jack Jones (7 November 1924 â€“ 23 March 2020) was an Australian rules footballer. He played in the Victorian Football League (VFL) for the Essendon Football Club between 1946 and 1954. He was born in Ascot Vale, Melbourne, Victoria. Jones died of cancer on 23 March 2020, at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jack Jones's playing statistics from AFL Tables Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Cancer deaths in Australia Category:Sportspeople from Melbourne
title: Jack Jones (footballer, born 1924)
